text: today I'm going to share with you a few
popcorn variations you can really
customize the flavor of your popcorn
however you like so be creative here
today I'm using one and a half teaspoons
of brown sugar here and to that I'm
going to add 3/4 of a teaspoon of kosher
salt 1 teaspoon of garam masala which is
an Indian spice blend a lot of warm
spices that has cinnamon cumin cardamom
coriander cloves and then 1/8 of a
teaspoon of cayenne pepper mix these
spices together and then this generously
sprinkle all over your popcorn and then
give this a good toss and use a spatula
use your hands whatever works smells so
good 2 tablespoons of melted butter I'm
just going to drizzle that over the top
and then mix it together and you're
ready to serve now how about some of
those other variations well in front of
me I have some options here you could do
grated pecorino which is a salty cheese
with a little bit of rosemary salt and
pepper this is some flaky sea salt and
ground pepper chili lime is really great
and really really fun and festive so
salt a little bit of lime zest
we've ground cumin and of course chili
powder and then a squeeze of lime juice
over the top at the end is really great
black sesame and pepper is also a good
combination of course with some salt and
that melted butter and the last
combination if you like smoky flavors a
little bit of smoked paprika and some
flaky kosher salt here so there you have
some fun flavor variations enjoy
[Music]
you
